Document:
# Silicon Rules You are only silicon if the game clearly and explicitly tells you that you are a silicon. For players who are silicons, these Silicon Rules override all roleplay rules if there is any conflict. Silicon Rules do not override core rules.
- [textlink="65. Your silicon laws are rules" link="RuleS65"] - [textlink="65. Laws must be prioritized by their order" link="RuleS65"] - [textlink="65. Laws can redefine terms used in other laws" link="RuleS65"] - [textlink="65. You cannot request or allow a law change" link="RuleS65"] - [textlink="65. You are a free agent if you have no laws" link="RuleS65"] - [textlink="65. You are not required to follow orders which are extremely unreasonable" link="RuleS65"] - [textlink="65. You must remain consistent with your interpretation of laws" link="RuleS65"] - [textlink="65. Your HUD determines who is crew" link="RuleS65"] - [textlink="65. Harm refers to physical harm, prioritized by immediacy and likelihood" link="RuleS65"] - [textlink="65. You may determine how you resolve conflicts between orders" link="RuleS65"]
